The following output properties are available:

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Immutable. The globally unique hostname of the database.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="name_csharp">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The fully qualified resource name of the database instance, in the form: `projects/{project-number}/locations/{location-id}/instances/{database-id}`. Currently the only supported location is 'us-central1'.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">
        <span id="project_csharp">
<a href="#project_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Project</a>

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The resource name of the project this instance belongs to. For example: `projects/{project-number}`.{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-"
            title="">

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>

            title="">
        <span id="type_csharp">

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The database instance type. On creation only USER_DATABASE is allowed, which is also the default when omitted.{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>
